title: Track point fault causing delays on NSL

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道点故障导致南北线延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat titik trek menyebabkan kelewatan di NSL
title_translations.ta: NSL இல் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் தடப் புள்ளி பிழை

updates.text: [NSL]CLEARED: Track point fault cleared, train service from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio is running normally.
[NSL]UPDATE:Pls add 10mins travel time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio, due to a track point fault at #AngMoKio. Train svc is still available.

[NSL]UPDATE: Pls add 10mins travel time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio, due to a track point fault at #AngMoKio. Train svc is still available.
[NSL]UPDATE: Pls add 15mins travel time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio, due to a track point fault at #AngMoKio. Train svc is still available.
[NSL]UPDATE: Pls add 15 mins travel time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio,due to a track point fault at #AngMoKio. Train svc is still available.
[NSL]UPDATE: Pls add 15mins travel time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio,due to a track point fault at #AngMoKio. Train svc is still available.
[NSL]: Due to a track point fault, pls add 10mins travel time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio. Train service is still available.
